caption.p: (a) Calculated dependency between the size of Pt clusters and the 1st shell CN. (b) Evolution of the NP size deduced from CNs obtained from EXAFS data fitting during the in situ coarsening in H 2 atmosphere of Pt NPs supported on Al 2O 3. Reproduced from ref ( 258) with permission from the PCCP Owner Societies. (c) Determination of the NP size for Fe NPs using CNs for the first ( C 1), third ( C 3), and fourth ( C 4) coordination shells. Adapted from ref ( 273) with permission from the PCCP Owner Societies.
